name: | H D D/D R E A M S |
name_original: | H D D/D R E A M S |
description:
Welcome to the digital dreams , visitors

Control : AWSD + Mouse + Shift (run)

Vitalii Zavoloka - project coordinator,  programming, game  design

Serhii Todosan - game design  (world with planet)

Taras Kovtun - 3D Art,  game design (world with blocks)

Vlad Melnyk - sound design, music, sfx

Olxandr Davydov - programming, game design (MUSICDREAM)

And special guest 

Yaroslav Stasiuk - programming
